For those with troubles while zooming on "E":

http://mouseraider.homepage.t-online.de/

Downloaded app and tested it in game. Works like a charm. Just


1. Set the GravLink to E
2. Set the aim (zoom) on any unused key (example "j")
3. Exit game, open Mouse Raider.
4. Press Change Settings and set HOTKEY to an unused key of Inversion (example "backspace")
5. Also, set BUTTON 2 to J. (or the matching chosen zoom key)
6. Keep Mouse Raider open and start the game



Press backspace to start Mouse Raider "mode" ingame.
Press Mouse 2 to zoom 
E to use GravLink 
backspace again to return to normal :)

Better than nothing. Cheers
